summary.span: 包含 .NET Framework 缓存功能的配置处理程序类。

span.span: Contains configuration handler classes for the .NET Framework caching feature.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此命名空间中的配置处理程序类用于用于 .NET Framework 应用程序的常规缓存。The configuration handler classes in this namespace are for general caching used with .NET Framework applications. ASP.NET 缓存的配置处理程序包含在 命名空间中。The configuration handlers for ASP.NET caching are contained in the namespace.
